item.title: Get your FREE Ninja Kodou Dubstep remix
item.description:
Yep Ninja Kodou & Aardvark Records are giving away a FREE legal MP3 download - it's Ninja Kodou's way of saying "thanks" to his growing number of fans .

The track 'Mechanical Freak (ADiSH Remix)' is an awsome Dubstep remix by ADiSH ,an awsome drum and bass \ dubstep producer. He's also one of Ninja Kodou's best mates. Tthe original "Mechanical Freak" is taken from the album NINJUTSU, released on Aardvark Records.

Play it loud and share!

Free MP3 download: http://www.mediafire.com/?tumnngdolrl
item.dc:creator: Aardvark Records
item.itunes:summary: Yep Ninja Kodou & Aardvark Records are giving away a FREE legal MP3 download - it's Ninja Kodou's way of saying "thanks" to his growing number of fans . The track 'Mechanical Freak (ADiSH Remix)' is an awsome Dubstep remix by ADiSH ,an awsome drum and bass \ dubstep producer. He's also one of Ninja Kodou's best mates. Tthe original "Mechanical Freak" is taken from the album NINJUTSU, released on Aardvark Records. Play it loud and share! Free MP3 download: http://www.mediafire.com/?tumnngdolrl

item.title: Yahel - Life Is A Test video
item.description: Video mashup for Yahel's new (and free to download) single 'Life Is A Test'.
item.dc:creator: Aardvark Records
item.itunes:summary: Video mashup for Yahel's new (and free to download) single 'Life Is A Test'.

item.title: Yahel - Life Is A Test (free mp3 download)
item.description: Yep FTP Music & Aardvark Records are giving away a FREE legal download from Yahel - in conjunction with DJ Magazine's Top 100 DJ poll...which is happening now. The track 'Life Is A Test' is our way of saying thanks you for all the support, love and faith you have so generously given over the years. Download it here. Music For The people! You can vote for Yahel here http://top100djs.djmag.com
item.dc:creator: Aardvark Records
item.itunes:summary:
Yep FTP Music & Aardvark Records are giving away a FREE legal download from Yahel - in conjunction with DJ Magazine's Top 100 DJ poll...which is happening now.
The track 'Life Is A Test' is our way of saying thanks you for all the support, love and faith you have so generously given over the years.
Download it here. Music For The people!
You can vote for Yahel here http://top100djs.djmag.com

item.title: Leith FM interview with Steve O'Connor
item.description: John Murray from Leith FM,(Edinburgh & Fife, Scotland) interview of Steve O'Connor (date: 14 October 2008) The single 'Hail Caledonia' from the album 'Roll The Dice' has been in heavy rotation at the station. Other songs featured in the interview were: Roll The Dice. This copy of the interview is courtesy of Leith FM. http://www.leithfm.co.uk
item.dc:creator: Aardvark Records
item.itunes:summary: John Murray from Leith FM,(Edinburgh & Fife, Scotland) interview of Steve O'Connor (date: 14 October 2008) The single 'Hail Caledonia' from the album 'Roll The Dice' has been in heavy rotation at the station. Other songs featured in the interview were: Roll The Dice. This copy of the interview is courtesy of Leith FM. http://www.leithfm.co.uk

item.title: Cuillin FM interview with Steve O'Connor
item.description: Inga Bonk from Cuillin FM,(Skye, Western Isles, Scotland) interview of Steve O'Connor (date: 26 September 2008) The single 'Hail Caledonia' from the album 'Roll The Dice' has been in heavy rotation at the station. Other songs featured in the interview were: Roll The Dice, Never Alone, No ordinary Life, Crazy over you, If god created angels and The needs of the many. This copy of the interview is courtesy of Cuillin FM. http://www.cuillinfm.co.uk
item.dc:creator: Aardvark Records
